Wisdom: الْمَعْرُوفُ سِيَادَةٌ
enWisdom: Benevolence is authority

Wisdom: أَفْضِلْ عَلَى النَّاسِ يَعْظُمْ قَدْرُكَ
enWisdom: Bestow favours on the people and your status will increase

Wisdom: بِفِعْلِ الْمَعْرُوفِ يُسْتَدَامُ الشُّكْرُ
enWisdom: Through benevolence, gratitude lasts

Wisdom: بِالْإِحْسَانِ وَتَغَمُّدِ الذُّنُوبِ بِالْغُفْرَانِ يَعْظُمُ الْمَجْدُ
enWisdom: Through kindness and covering faults with forgiveness, eminence increases

Wisdom: تَمَامُ السُّودَدِ ابْتِدَاءُ الصَّنَائِعِ
enWisdom: The completion of eminence is in taking the initiative to do good to others

Wisdom: ذُو الْإِفْضَالِ مَشْكُورُ السِّيَادَةِ
enWisdom: Whoever bestows favours on others, they are thankful for his authority

Wisdom: ذُو الْمَعْرُوفِ مَحْمُودُ الْعَادَةِ
enWisdom: Whoever shows benevolence, his habit is praised

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِمَكَارِمِ الْخِلَالِ وَاصْطِنَاعِ الرِّجَالِ فَإِنَّهُمَا يَقِيَانِ مَصَارِعَ السَّوْءِ وَيُوجِبَانِ الْجَلَالَةَ
enWisdom: Acquire noble traits and do good to the people, for indeed these two things protect one from falling into difficulties and lead to loftiness

Wisdom: عِنْدَ كَثْرَةِ الْإِفْضَالِ وَشِدَّةِ الِاحْتِمَالِ تَتَحَقَّقُ الْجَلَالَةُ
enWisdom: When acts of kindness increase and forbearance becomes strong, loftiness is attained

Wisdom: كَثْرَةُ الصَّنَائِعِ تَرْفَعُ الشَّرَفَ وَيَسْتَدِيمُ الشُّكْرَ
enWisdom: Doing a lot of good turns raises one’s honour and makes gratitude last

Wisdom: مَعَ الْإِحْسَانِ تَكُونُ الرِّفْعَةُ
enWisdom: With goodness [to others], there is loftiness

Wisdom: الْإِحْسَانُ مَحَبَّةٌ
enWisdom: Kindness is [a cause of] love

Wisdom: سَبَبُ الْمَحَبَّةِ الْإِحْسَانُ
enWisdom: The cause of affection is benevolence

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ إِلَى النَّاسِ اسْتَدَامَ مِنْهُمُ الْمَحَبَّةَ
enWisdom: Whoever does good to the people, their love for him lasts

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ إِحْسَانُهُ أَحَبَّهُ إِخْوَانُهُ
enWisdom: One whose kindness is abundant is loved by his brothers

Wisdom: مَنْ صَنَعَ الْعَارِفَةَ الْجَمِيلَةَ حَازَ الْمَحْمَدَةَ الْجَزِيلَةَ
enWisdom: One who renders a beautiful deed acquires great praise

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ اكْتَسَبَ حُسْنَ الثَّنَاءِ
enWisdom: One who does a kind act earns good praise

Wisdom: لَا يُحْمَدُ إِلَّا مَنْ بَذَلَ إِحْسَانَهُ
enWisdom: None is praised except the one who shows his kindness

Wisdom: المروف [الْمَعْرُوفُ‏] حَسَبٌ
enWisdom: Benevolence is distinction

Wisdom: الْمُحْسِنُ مُعَانٌ الْمُسِي‏ءُ مُهَانٌ
enWisdom: The benevolent is supported

Wisdom: الْكَرَمُ أَعْطَفُ مِنَ الرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: Nobleness is [being] more compassionate than close relatives

Wisdom: الْمُحْسِنُ حَيٌّ وَإِنْ نُقِلَ إِلَى مَنَازِلِ الْأَمْوَاتِ
enWisdom: The benevolent one is alive, even if he is transferred to the dwellings of the dead

Wisdom: الْكَرِيمُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ مَحْبُورٌ مُثَابٌ وَعِنْدَ النَّاسِ مَحْبُوبٌ مُهَابٌ
enWisdom: The noble-minded person is felicitous and worthy of reward in the sight of Allah, and is loved and venerated in the sight of the people

Wisdom: أَحْسِنْ تُشْكَرْ
enWisdom: Do good and you will be thanked

Wisdom: أَحْسِنْ يُحْسَنْ إِلَيْكَ
enWisdom: Be good [to others] and good will be done to you

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ إِنْ أَحْسَنْتَ فَنَفْسَكَ تُكْرِمُ وَإِلَيْهَا تُحْسِنُ
enWisdom: Verily if you do good [to others] then you are [actually] honouring your own soul and doing good to it

Wisdom: صَاحِبُ الْمَعْرُوفِ لَا يَعْثَرُ وَإِذَا عَثَرَ وَجَدَ مُتَّكَأً
enWisdom: The doer of good deeds does not stumble, and when he does stumble, he finds a support [to hold on to]

Wisdom: صَنَائِعُ الْمَعْرُوفِ تَقِي مَصَارِعَ الْهَوَانِ
enWisdom: Performing benevolent actions protects one from falling into disgrace

Wisdom: صَنَائِعُ الْمَعْرُوفِ تُدِرُّ النَّعْمَاءَ وَتَدْفَعُ الْبَلَاءَ
enWisdom: Performing benevolent actions causes the abundant flow of blessings and wards off calamity

Wisdom: عَادَةُ الْإِحْسَانِ مَادَّةُ الْإِمْكَانِ
enWisdom: The habit of benevolence is the source of capability [or power]

Wisdom: كُلُّ مُحْسِنٍ مُسْتَأْنِسٌ
enWisdom: Every good doer is affable

Wisdom: كُلُّ نِعْمَةٍ أُنِيلَ مِنْهَا الْمَعْرُوفُ فَإِنَّهَا مَأْمُونَةُ السَّلْبِ مُحَصَّنَةٌ مِنَ الْغِيَرِ
enWisdom: Every blessing from which good is done [to others] is indeed safe from being taken away and is protected from vicissitudes

Wisdom: كَثْرَةُ اصْطِنَاعِ الْمَعْرُوفِ تَزِيدُ فِي الْعُمُرِ وَتَنْشُرُ الذِّكْرَ
enWisdom: Increased rendering of benevolent works prolongs life and spreads renown

Wisdom: كَافِلُ دَوَامِ الْغِنَى وَالْإِمْكَانِ إِتْبَاعُ الْإِحْسَانِ الْإِحْسَانَ
enWisdom: The guarantee of continued affluence and capability [and power] is [in] following up one favour with another favour

Wisdom: مَنْ بَذَلَ مَعْرُوفَهُ كَثُرَ الرَّاغِبُ إِلَيْهِ
enWisdom: Whoever extends his goodness [to others], more people are inclined towards him

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ إِحْسَانُهُ كَثُرَ خَدَمُهُ وَأَعْوَانُهُ
enWisdom: One whose benefaction increases, his assistants and helpers [also] increase

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ إِلَى النَّاسِ حَسُنَتْ عَوَاقِبُهُ وَسَهُلَتْ لَهُ طُرُقُهُ
enWisdom: One who is kind to the people, his outcomes become good and the ways [to his goals] become easy for him

Wisdom: مِنَ النُّبْلِ أَنْ يَبْذُلَ الرَّجُلُ مَالَهُ وَيَصُونَ عِرْضَهُ
enWisdom: It is from nobility for a man to spend his wealth and safeguard his dignity

Wisdom: مَا اكْتُسِبَ الشُّكْرُ بِمِثْلِ بَذْلِ الْمَعْرُوفِ
enWisdom: Nothing earns gratitude like doing good to others

Wisdom: مَا حُصِّنَتِ النِّعَمُ بِمِثْلِ الْإِنْعَامِ بِهَا
enWisdom: Nothing safeguards blessings like granting them to others

Wisdom: مَا مِنْ شَيْ‏ءٍ يَحْصُلُ بِهِ الْأَمَانُ أَبْلَغَ مِنْ إِيمَانٍ وَإِحْسَانٍ
enWisdom: Nothing brings greater security than [having] faith and [performing] good deeds

Wisdom: وَضْعُ الصَّنِيعَةِ فِي أَهْلِهَا يَكْبِتُ الْعَدُوَّ وَيَقِي مَصَارِعَ السَّوْءِ
enWisdom: Doing a good turn to those who deserve it subdues the enemy and protects from falling into evil
